data.name: Monster RPG 3 Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The sounds in Monster RPG 3, including this soundtrack, are mostly synthesized as the game plays from simple text descriptions. The size of the soundtrack in the Monster RPG 3 download is therefore just a few kilobytes. The MP3s in this DLC have been recorded from those text descriptions for convenience.

New


This DLC now includes an NES ROM version of the soundtrack playable in an emulator. You can find it in the Soundtrack folder in your Steam installation.

Track list:

1. The Squat (1:48)
2. World's Largest (1:37)
3. Déjà vu (1:48)
4. Jumping Jacks (0:25)
5. Blizzard (1:12)
6. Homefest (1:36)
7. Troutsneeze (0:57)
8. Trainwreck (1:42)
9. Boatin' (1:56)
10. Save the World (0:59)
11. Minus the Wind (1:36)
12. Jolly Good (1:16)
13. Top of a Mountain (1:29)
14. Over the Moon (1:10)
15. Till Next Time (1:28)

data.short_description: The synthesized music from Monster RPG 3, recorded and encoded as MP3s and now including an NES ROM version.
data.supported_languages:
French*, English*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
